answerBox.snippet:
Meta Threads is a text extension of Instagram. Core features of Threads include
the following: Posts up to 500 characters long. Video posts up to five minutes
long, as well as links and photos.

peopleAlsoAsk.question: What's the purpose of Meta Threads?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet:
Meta, the parent company of Facebook and Instagram has built Threads, a new app
that allows users to share text updates primarily. Users can provide real-time
updates and initiate public conversation on various topics. It is considered a
rival to Twitter.
Jul 14, 2023
peopleAlsoAsk.title: What is Meta Threads? How Can It Benefit Businesses? - Emeritus

peopleAlsoAsk.question: What is the new app Meta Threads?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet:
Threads is a text-based app for public conversation that is based on Instagram,
and was developed by Meta's Instagram team. Users will have to sign up for
Instagram to use Threads, and can migrate with their same username and the
accounts they were following on Instagram.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: Threads Review | Meta's new app wears Twitter's skin but lacks its teeth

peopleAlsoAsk.question: How do you use Meta Threads app?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet:
HOW TO JOIN AND USE META'S TWITTER RIVAL THREADS
1
Join Instagram if you don't have an account. ...
2
Sign in on the Threads app. ...
3
Create your profile. ...
4
Go private or public. ...
5
Select the accounts to follow. ...
6
Join and view the main feed. ...
7
View the main feed. ...
8
Respond to a post.

peopleAlsoAsk.question: Is Meta Threads safe to use?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet:

“may collect highly sensitive information about users in order to profile their
digital activity—including health and financial data, precise location, browsing
history, contacts, search history and other sensitive information.” The app ...
